game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: A long-abandoned temple has been discovered in the depths of the forest, and rumors say that it holds a powerful artifact. Your task is to explore the temple, overcome its dangers, and retrieve the artifact.

tasks.description: Make your way through the dense forest to reach the entrance of the lost temple.
Inside the temple, find and solve an ancient puzzle to unlock the next chamber.
After solving the puzzle, navigate through a series of traps and retrieve the artifact from the central chamber.
